Generate simulated NEDS data for PCCC and wide-data testing

generate_neds_pts.Rd

Generate simulated NEDS data for PCCC and wide-data testing

generate_neds_pts(n = 1000L, ncol = 20L, icd10 = TRUE,
  verbose = FALSE)

Arguments

n

Integer number of rows of data to generate
ncol

Integer number of diagnostic code columns, default of 20 matches NEDS
icd10

Logical, default `TRUE` to sample ICD-10-CM codes. `FALSE` gives `ICD-9`
verbose

single logical value, defaults to FALSE in most functions.

Examples

summary(icd::comorbid_pccc_dx(icd:::generate_neds_pts()))
#>  neuromusc          cvd          respiratory       renal        
#>  Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical  
#>  FALSE:998       FALSE:998       FALSE:1000      FALSE:1000     
#>  TRUE :2         TRUE :2                                        
#>      gi          hemato_immu     metabolic       congeni_genetic
#>  Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical  
#>  FALSE:996       FALSE:998       FALSE:997       FALSE:998      
#>  TRUE :4         TRUE :2         TRUE :3         TRUE :2        
#>  malignancy       neonatal        tech_dep       transplant     
#>  Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical  
#>  FALSE:995       FALSE:999       FALSE:999       FALSE:999      
#>  TRUE :5         TRUE :1         TRUE :1         TRUE :1        
neds <- icd:::generate_neds_pts(n = 100, ncol = 10L, icd10 = FALSE)
stopifnot(dim(neds) == c(100L, 11L))
summary(icd::comorbid_pccc_dx(neds))
#>  neuromusc          cvd          respiratory       renal        
#>  Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical  
#>  FALSE:100       FALSE:100       FALSE:100       FALSE:100      
#>                                                                 
#>      gi          hemato_immu     metabolic       congeni_genetic
#>  Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical  
#>  FALSE:100       FALSE:99        FALSE:100       FALSE:100      
#>                  TRUE :1                                        
#>  malignancy       neonatal        tech_dep       transplant     
#>  Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical   Mode :logical  
#>  FALSE:97        FALSE:100       FALSE:100       FALSE:100      
#>  TRUE :3                                                        
# NOT RUN {
# original size data for PCCC benchmarking:
set.seed(1441)
neds <- icd:::generate_neds_pts(28584301L)
neds_comorbid <- icd::comorbid_pccc_dx(neds)
# }
